item.title: [PI] How can i double attack speed?
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

Hey, for example I have a Nex like monster but for the last stage I want him to hit twice for every game tick. Does anyone know any code for this? :S

Code so far:
case 1:
if(npcs.HP <= 25000 && npcs.HP >= 22500) {
npcs.forceChat(“Fill My Soul With Smoke!”);
c.getPA().appendPoison(160);
c.gfx0(391);
npcs.attackType = 1;
c.sendMessage(“The man fills your lungs with a deathly smoke.”);
}
if(npcs.HP <= 20000 && npcs.HP >= 17500) {
npcs.forceChat(“Embrace Darkness!”);
c.gfx0(382);
npcs.attackType = 1;
c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418);
c.sendMessage(“You’re encased in a unholy shadow.”);
}
if(npcs.HP <= 10000 && npcs.HP >= 7500) {
npcs.HP += 185;
npcs.attackType = 2;
c.gfx0(377);
c.sendMessage(“The man Saps your health and increases his own.”);
}
if(npcs.HP <= 5000 && npcs.HP >= 1000) {
npcs.forceAnim(19);//turm
npcs.forceChat(“There is…NO ESCAPE!”);
npcs.hitDelayTimer += 2;
}
npcs.projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs.attackType = 0;
if(npcs.HP <= 30000 && npcs.HP >= 29900) {
npcs.projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs.forceChat(“AT LAST!!!”);
npcs.attackType = 1;
}
break;

Also if anyone knows how to make a monster activate the turmoil curse would be helpful

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How can i double attack speed?
